description.en: A professional who manages financial records, ensuring compliance and advising on fiscal matters.
description.cn: 会计师管理财务记录，确保税务合规，并提供财务建议。

description.en: A performer skilled in balance, agility, and coordination for stage or circus acts.
description.cn: 杂技演员擅长平衡、敏捷和协调，通常在马戏团或舞台表演中。

description.en: A live performer who brings dramatic characters to life on stage.
description.cn: 戏剧演员在舞台上表演，通过戏剧艺术赋予角色生命。

description.en: An actor who portrays characters in movies through performance and screen presence.
description.cn: 电影演员在电影中表演，诠释剧本并在银幕上塑造角色。

description.en: A professional detective who investigates cases and gathers evidence.
description.cn: 事务所侦探为客户进行调查，收集情报和证据。

description.en: A medical expert who diagnoses and treats mental disorders using therapy and medication.
description.cn: 精神病医生诊断和治疗精神疾病，通常通过治疗和药物。

description.en: A specialist who trains animals and manages their behavior.
description.cn: 动物训练师负责训练动物并管理它们的行为。

description.en: An expert in valuing, researching, and preserving cultural relics and artifacts.
description.cn: 文物学家专长于鉴定、研究和保护文化文物。

description.en: A merchant who buys, sells, and appraises antiques and collectibles.
description.cn: 古董商从事古董的收购、销售和鉴定。

description.en: A researcher who studies past human cultures through excavation and analysis of artifacts.
description.cn: 考古学家通过挖掘和分析文物研究古代文化。

description.en: A professional who designs buildings and oversees construction projects.
description.cn: 建筑师负责建筑设计并监督施工项目。

description.en: A creative individual skilled in various artistic mediums and expression.
description.cn: 艺术家擅长各种艺术媒介和表达方式。

description.en: An attendant who supports and cares for patients in a psychiatric hospital.
description.cn: 精神病院护工负责照顾精神病患者。

description.en: A sports competitor who excels in physical strength and agility.
description.cn: 运动员在体育竞赛中展现出力量与敏捷。

description.en: A creative professional who writes literature and crafts narratives.
description.cn: 作家擅长文学创作和叙事。

description.en: A service professional who mixes drinks and engages with patrons.
description.cn: 酒保调制饮品并与顾客互动。

description.en: A tracker and marksman skilled in wilderness survival and pursuit.
description.cn: 猎人精通野外生存、追踪和射击。

description.en: A dealer in books who manages inventories and exchanges knowledge.
description.cn: 书商经营书籍，管理库存并交流知识。

description.en: A tracker for hire who pursues fugitives for a reward.
description.cn: 赏金猎人受雇追捕逃犯以获取赏金。

description.en: A combat athlete specializing in boxing or wrestling techniques.
description.cn: 拳击手或摔跤手以近身搏斗见长。

description.en: A domestic worker who manages household affairs and assists with daily tasks.
description.cn: 管家或仆人负责管理家务并协助日常事务。

description.en: A religious figure responsible for spiritual guidance and services.
description.cn: 神职人员提供精神指导并主持宗教仪式。

description.en: A technical expert skilled in computer programming and electronics repair.
description.cn: 程序员及电子工程师精通计算机编程和电子维修。

description.en: A computer expert skilled in breaking into systems and digital security.
description.cn: 黑客精通计算机系统，擅长攻破数字安全防护。

description.en: A rugged individual skilled in Ride, roping, and outdoor survival.
description.cn: 牛仔精于骑乘、套索和野外生存。

description.en: A skilled tradesperson who creates or repairs items with precision.
description.cn: 工匠以精湛技艺制造或修理物品。

description.en: A lethal operative who eliminates targets with stealth and precision.
description.cn: 刺客以隐秘和精确的手法消灭目标。

description.en: A criminal who executes high-risk bank heists using force and technical skills.
description.cn: 银行劫匪通过暴力和技术手段实施高风险抢劫。

description.en: A muscle-bound criminal employed for intimidation and physical enforcement.
description.cn: 打手以暴力和恐吓手段为犯罪集团提供支持。

description.en: A stealthy criminal skilled in burglary, lockpicking, and sleight of hand.
description.cn: 窃贼以潜行和灵巧的手法实施盗窃。

description.en: A deceptive operator who uses charm and trickery to defraud victims.
description.cn: 欺诈师利用魅力和伎俩欺骗受害者。

description.en: An independent criminal who operates without support, using a mix of skills.
description.cn: 独行罪犯独自行动，凭借多种技能实施犯罪。

description.en: A nimble and stealthy thief known for burglary and high-society heists.
description.cn: 女飞贼以轻巧身手进行入室盗窃，擅长高端盗窃。

description.en: A middleman who deals in stolen goods and forged documents.
description.cn: 赃物贩子专门买卖赃物及伪造品。

description.en: A specialist in creating false documents and imitations of artwork.
description.cn: 赝造者专长于伪造文件和艺术品。

description.en: A criminal who transports contraband across borders using stealth and speed.
description.cn: 走私者利用潜行与速度将违禁品跨境运输。

description.en: A low-level criminal involved in street-level violence and petty crimes.
description.cn: 混混从事街头暴力及小型犯罪。

description.en: A charismatic leader who directs a cult or secret society.
description.cn: 教团首领以魅力领导秘密团体。

description.en: A specialist who deals with the removal of malevolent influences, sometimes using hypnosis.
description.cn: 除魅师处理负面影响, 经KP允许可用催眠替换一项技能。

description.en: A creative professional skilled in visual aesthetics and technical design.
description.cn: 设计师擅长视觉美学与技术设计。

description.en: An individual with a passion for art who dabbles in various creative pursuits.
description.cn: 业余艺术爱好者热爱艺术，涉猎多种创作活动。

description.en: A specialist in underwater exploration, repair, and survival.
description.cn: 潜水员擅长水下探索、维修与生存。

description.en: A medical professional responsible for diagnosing and treating illnesses.
description.cn: 医生负责诊断和治疗疾病。

description.en: A wanderer with little means who survives through a mix of skills.
description.cn: 流浪者凭借各种技能在社会边缘生存。

description.en: A professional driver employed to transport private clients safely.
description.cn: 私人司机负责安全接送客户。

description.en: A driver skilled in vehicle operation for various transportation needs.
description.cn: 司机熟练驾驶各类车辆满足运输需求。

description.en: A professional who drives a taxi and interacts with a variety of customers.
description.cn: 出租车司机驾驶出租车并与各类乘客交流。

description.en: A professional who refines written content and ensures clarity and coherence.
description.cn: 编辑负责润色文字内容，确保表达清晰。

description.en: An administrator responsible for governance, policy, and public service.
description.cn: 政府官员负责行政管理、政策制定及公共服务。

description.en: A technical expert involved in designing and building complex structures or systems.
description.cn: 工程师参与复杂结构或系统的设计与建设。

description.en: A performer skilled in various art forms such as acting, singing, or comedy.
description.cn: 艺人擅长表演、演唱或喜剧等多种艺术形式。

description.en: An intrepid explorer who seeks out uncharted lands and hidden treasures.
description.cn: 探险家勇于探索未知之地和隐藏的宝藏。

description.en: A cultivator who works the land and manages agricultural production.
description.cn: 农民耕作土地，管理农业生产。

description.en: An official involved in the administration of justice and legal proceedings.
description.cn: 司法人员参与法律程序和公正执行。

description.en: A first responder trained to combat fires and rescue people in emergencies.
description.cn: 消防员训练有素，负责灭火和紧急救援。

description.en: A journalist who reports on international events and foreign affairs.
description.cn: 驻外记者报道国际事件和外交事务。

description.en: A specialist who applies scientific methods to investigate crimes.
description.cn: 法医利用科学方法调查犯罪现场。

description.en: An individual who takes risks in games of chance and wagers.
description.cn: 赌徒在赌博中冒险下注。

description.en: The head of a criminal organization who directs operations and commands loyalty.
description.cn: 黑帮老大指挥犯罪活动并统御手下。

description.en: A subordinate gangster who enforces the will of the crime boss.
description.cn: 马仔负责执行黑帮老大的命令。

description.en: An individual known for refined manners, style, and cultured pursuits.
description.cn: 绅士与淑女以优雅举止和文化修养著称。

description.en: A vagrant surviving on minimal resources while relying on street skills.
description.cn: 游民依靠街头技能在边缘生存。

description.en: A worker who handles a variety of miscellaneous tasks and repairs.
description.cn: 勤杂护工负责多项杂务和修理工作。

description.en: A reporter who delves deeply into stories to uncover hidden truths.
description.cn: 调查记者深入挖掘新闻事实，揭露真相。

description.en: A news reporter who covers events on location and reports live.
description.cn: 通讯记者在现场报道新闻事件。

description.en: A legal authority who presides over court proceedings and administers justice.
description.cn: 法官主持庭审，确保司法公正。

description.en: An assistant who supports laboratory research and scientific experiments.
description.cn: 实验室助理协助科学实验与研究工作。

description.en: A laborer performing routine tasks without specialized skills.
description.cn: 非熟练工人从事常规劳动，无需专门技能。

description.en: A laborer skilled in cutting timber and working in forest environments.
description.cn: 伐木工擅长砍伐木材及林区作业。

description.en: A laborer who extracts minerals from mines and works underground.
description.cn: 矿工负责开采矿产并在地下作业。

description.en: A legal professional who provides counsel and represents clients in court.
description.cn: 律师为客户提供法律咨询，并在法庭上辩护。

description.en: A custodian of books and information, managing library collections.
description.cn: 图书馆管理员负责管理图书和信息收藏。

description.en: A technical specialist skilled in various trades and repairs.
description.cn: 技师精通木工、焊接、管道等多种技术。

description.en: A military leader skilled in tactics, combat, and leadership.
description.cn: 军官精通战术、战斗和领导能力。

description.en: A religious emissary who spreads faith and provides humanitarian aid.
description.cn: 传教士传播信仰并提供人道援助。

description.en: An adventurer specialized in climbing and surviving in rugged mountain terrains.
description.cn: 登山家专长于攀登和在崎岖山地生存。

description.en: A guardian of historical and cultural artifacts in a museum setting.
description.cn: 博物馆管理员负责保护历史和文化遗产。

description.en: A performer who creates and plays music using various instruments.
description.cn: 音乐家擅长演奏各种乐器并创作音乐。

description.en: A healthcare professional who provides patient care and medical support.
description.cn: 护士负责病患护理及医疗支持。

description.en: A scholar of hidden lore, mysteries, and supernatural phenomena.
description.cn: 神秘学家研究隐秘学问和超自然现象。

name.cn: 心理学家､精神分析学家

description.en: A mental health professional focused on behavior, analysis, and therapy.
description.cn: 心理学家和精神分析学家专注于行为分析和治疗。

description.en: An academic or scientist who investigates various fields of study.
description.cn: 研究员从事各领域的学术或科学研究。

description.en: A sailor serving in a navy vessel, skilled in shipboard operations and combat.
description.cn: 军舰海员在军舰上作业，精通船上操作和战斗。

description.en: A crew member of a merchant ship responsible for Navigate and vessel maintenance.
description.cn: 民船海员负责民船的导航和维护。

description.en: A persuasive individual skilled in selling products or ideas to customers.
description.cn: 推销员善于向顾客推销产品或理念。

description.en: A researcher in one or more scientific fields who advances knowledge.
description.cn: 科学家在一个或多个科学领域推进知识。

description.en: An administrative professional skilled in typing, organization, and communication.
description.cn: 秘书擅长打字、组织和沟通。

description.en: An entrepreneur who manages a retail establishment.
description.cn: 店老板经营零售商店。

description.en: A professional working in an office environment, handling administrative tasks.
description.cn: 白领工人从事办公室行政工作。

name.cn: 白领工人-中高层管理人员

description.en: A senior professional responsible for strategic decisions and organizational leadership.
description.cn: 中高层管理人员负责战略决策与组织领导。

description.en: An individual driven by extreme enthusiasm and dedication to a cause.
description.cn: 狂热者因对某事业的极端热情而行动。

description.en: A caretaker responsible for feeding and maintaining the well-being of animals.
description.cn: 饲养员负责喂养及照顾动物。

description.en: A student or intern pursuing education and practical experience in their chosen field.
description.cn: 学生或实习生在所选领域追求学习和实践经验。
